meanings.sent1: The room was filled with semidarkness, making it hard to see clearly.
meanings.sent2: As the sun set, the semidarkness enveloped the forest in a mysterious glow.
meanings.sent3: In the semidarkness, the cat mistook a sock for a mouse and pounced on it playfully.
meanings.sent4: The semidarkness of the cave felt like a comforting blanket, shielding us from the harsh sunlight outside.
meanings.sent5: The semidarkness of the theater added to the suspense of the horror movie, keeping the audience on edge.

meanings.definition: A state of being partially dark
meanings.sent1: The semidarkness of the room created a cozy atmosphere for reading before bed.
meanings.sent2: The semidarkness of the evening sky signaled the approaching nightfall.
meanings.sent3: The semidarkness of the basement made it the perfect spot for a game of hide-and-seek.
meanings.sent4: In the semidarkness of the forest, the trees seemed to whisper secrets to each other.
meanings.sent5: The semidarkness of the library encouraged a quiet, contemplative mood among the readers.

meanings.definition: A condition of being dimly lit
meanings.sent1: The semidarkness of the hallway made it feel eerie and mysterious.
meanings.sent2: The semidarkness of the street lamps cast long shadows on the deserted road.
meanings.sent3: In the semidarkness of the room, the glowing eyes of the cat seemed to float in mid-air.
meanings.sent4: The semidarkness of the evening sky was dotted with twinkling stars, creating a magical scene.
meanings.sent5: The semidarkness of the attic hid treasures waiting to be discovered by curious explorers.
